name: Decoder (GGJ_2018)
description:
Decoder is a fictional simulation of the historic enigma machine, which relies on the player’s ability to decipher the enemies’ messages that menace London. Every action counts, time is short, a missile approaches.  But we cannot rely only on the machine as every transmission is expressed through riddles that hide the key to salvation.  

-Theme: transmission-

Enrique Arrontes - Programming, Design, Production

María Artetxe - Lead narrator, Design, Programming, Production

Katia Cervera - Production, Design, Narrative

Alberto Ezcurra - Art, Design, Production, Programming

Carlos Gómez - Lead programmer, Design, Production

Inés Laborda - Lead artist, Design, Production
